commit.message: Bugfix: comply with BIP 0014 by sending the correct codebase name of Satoshi and, if PUBLIC_CLIENT_NAME is defined, the front-end name after that

files.patch:
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 * update (commit) version in sources
   bitcoin-qt.pro
-  src/main.h      (CLIENT_VERSION : PROTOCOL_VERSION in serialize.h is updated only on protocol changes)
+  src/main.h      (CODEBASE_VERSION : PROTOCOL_VERSION in serialize.h is updated only on protocol changes)
   share/setup.nsi
   doc/README*
